SEARCH
Package com.cinemate.social.forum

Class ForumService

java.lang.Object
com.cinemate.social.forum.ForumService
@Service public class ForumService extends Object
Service class for managing forum operations. Provides business logic for forum posts, replies, subscriptions, and related functionality. Handles data persistence, event publishing, and business rule enforcement.
Version:
1.0
Author:
CineMate Team

  • Method Details

    • createPost

      public ForumPost createPost(ForumPost post, String userId)
      Creates a new forum post with the specified user as the author. Automatically subscribes the author to their own post and publishes an event for notifications.
      Parameters:
      post - the forum post to create
      userId - the ID of the user creating the post
      Returns:
      the created ForumPost entity
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the user is not found

    • getAllPosts

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPost> getAllPosts(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves all forum posts that are not deleted, ordered by creation date (newest first).
      Parameters:
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumPost entities

    • getPostsByCategory

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPost> getPostsByCategory(ForumCategory category, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves forum posts filtered by category, ordered by creation date (newest first).
      Parameters:
      category - the category to filter by
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumPost entities in the specified category

    • getPostById

      public Optional<ForumPost> getPostById(String id)
      Retrieves a specific forum post by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the forum post
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the ForumPost if found, empty otherwise

      authorId - the ID of the author
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumPost entities created by the specified author

    • searchPosts

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPost> searchPosts(String searchTerm, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Searches for forum posts based on title or content matching the search term.
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - the term to search for in post titles and content
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumPost entities matching the search criteria

      Retrieves forum posts ordered by like count (most liked first).
      Parameters:
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumPost entities ordered by popularity

      Parameters:
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumPost entities ordered by recent activity

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPost> getPostsUserParticipatedIn(String userId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves forum posts where the specified user has participated (either as author or replied to).
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumPost entities where the user has participated

    • updatePost

      public ForumPost updatePost(String postId, ForumPost updatedPost, String userId)
      Updates a forum post. Only the author can edit their post (not admins).
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to update
      updatedPost - the updated post data
      userId - the ID of the user attempting to update the post
      Returns:
      the updated ForumPost entity
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the post is not found or user is not authorized

    • deletePost

      public void deletePost(String postId, String userId)
      Marks a forum post as deleted (soft delete). Only the author of the post can delete it.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to delete
      userId - the ID of the user attempting to delete the post
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the post is not found or user is not authorized

    • adminDeletePost

      public void adminDeletePost(String postId)
      Admin method to delete posts without authorization checks. Useful for cleaning up posts from deleted users.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to delete
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the post is not found

    • toggleLike

      public ForumPost toggleLike(String postId, String userId)

    • isPostLikedByUser

      public boolean isPostLikedByUser(String postId, String userId)
      Checks if a specific user has liked a specific forum post.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to check
      userId - the ID of the user to check
      Returns:
      true if the user has liked the post, false otherwise

    • incrementViewCount

      public void incrementViewCount(String postId)
      Increments the view count of a forum post.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to increment views for

    • createReply

      public ForumReply createReply(ForumReply reply, String userId, String postId)
      Creates a new reply to a forum post. Updates the parent post's reply count and last modified date. Publishes an event for notification purposes.
      Parameters:
      reply - the reply to create
      userId - the ID of the user creating the reply
      postId - the ID of the post being replied to
      Returns:
      the created ForumReply entity
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the user or post is not found

    • getRepliesForPost

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumReply> getRepliesForPost(String postId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves replies for a specific forum post, ordered by creation date (oldest first).
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to get replies for
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumReply entities for the specified post

    • getRepliesByAuthor

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumReply> getRepliesByAuthor(String authorId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves replies created by a specific author.
      Parameters:
      authorId - the ID of the author
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumReply entities created by the specified author

    • updateReply

      public ForumReply updateReply(String replyId, ForumReply updatedReply, String userId)
      Updates a forum reply. Only the author can edit their reply (not admins).
      Parameters:
      replyId - the ID of the reply to update
      updatedReply - the updated reply data
      userId - the ID of the user attempting to update the reply
      Returns:
      the updated ForumReply entity
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the reply is not found or user is not authorized

    • deleteReply

      public void deleteReply(String replyId, String userId)
      Marks a forum reply as deleted (soft delete). Only the author of the reply or an admin can delete it.
      Parameters:
      replyId - the ID of the reply to delete
      userId - the ID of the user attempting to delete the reply
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the reply is not found or user is not authorized

    • toggleReplyLike

      public ForumReply toggleReplyLike(String replyId, String userId)
      Toggles a user's like on a forum reply.
      Parameters:
      replyId - the ID of the reply to like/unlike
      userId - the ID of the user toggling the like
      Returns:
      the updated ForumReply entity
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the reply is not found

    • getPostCountByCategory

      public long getPostCountByCategory(ForumCategory category)
      Counts the number of forum posts in a specific category.
      Parameters:
      category - the category to count posts for
      Returns:
      the number of posts in the specified category

    • getPostCountByAuthor

      public long getPostCountByAuthor(String authorId)
      Counts the number of forum posts created by a specific author.
      Parameters:
      authorId - the ID of the author
      Returns:
      the number of posts created by the specified author

    • getReplyCountByAuthor

      public long getReplyCountByAuthor(String authorId)
      Counts the number of forum replies created by a specific author.
      Parameters:
      authorId - the ID of the author
      Returns:
      the number of replies created by the specified author

    • pinPost

      public ForumPost pinPost(String postId, boolean pinned)
      Pins or unpins a forum post. Pinned posts are displayed at the top of the forum.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to pin/unpin
      pinned - true to pin the post, false to unpin
      Returns:
      the updated ForumPost entity
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the post is not found

    • lockPost

      public ForumPost lockPost(String postId, boolean locked)
      Locks or unlocks a forum post. Locked posts cannot receive new replies.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to lock/unlock
      locked - true to lock the post, false to unlock
      Returns:
      the updated ForumPost entity
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the post is not found

    • subscribeToPost

      public ForumSubscription subscribeToPost(String postId, String userId)
      Subscribes a user to a forum post. If the user is already subscribed, returns the existing subscription.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to subscribe to
      userId - the ID of the user subscribing
      Returns:
      the ForumSubscription entity
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the user or post is not found

    • unsubscribeFromPost

      public void unsubscribeFromPost(String postId, String userId)
      Unsubscribes a user from a forum post. Marks the subscription as inactive instead of deleting it.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to unsubscribe from
      userId - the ID of the user unsubscribing

    • getUserSubscriptions

      public List<ForumSubscription> getUserSubscriptions(String userId)
      Retrieves all active subscriptions for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a List of ForumSubscription entities

    • isUserSubscribedToPost

      public boolean isUserSubscribedToPost(String userId, String postId)
      Checks if a user is subscribed to a specific forum post.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      postId - the ID of the post
      Returns:
      true if the user is subscribed, false otherwise

    • getSubscriptionCount

      public long getSubscriptionCount(String postId)
      Counts the number of active subscriptions for a forum post.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post
      Returns:
      the number of active subscriptions

    • getPostsByMediaType

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPost> getPostsByMediaType(String mediaType, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves forum posts filtered by media type.
      Parameters:
      mediaType - the media type to filter by ("movie", "series", "none")
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumPost entities with the specified media type

    • getPostsByCategoryAndMediaType

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPost> getPostsByCategoryAndMediaType(ForumCategory category, String mediaType, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves forum posts filtered by both category and media type.
      Parameters:
      category - the category to filter by
      mediaType - the media type to filter by ("movie", "series", "none")
      pageable - pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page containing ForumPost entities matching both criteria
